Items.text: Alright kid, we're going to start you off with some of the basics.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: You can move around the ring. Try getting a feel for that!
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: Now, let's see how hard you can hit.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: Press Z to punch. It's that easy!
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: You'll use energy with each punch, so be careful not to tire yourself out.
Items.name: Gym Teacher

Items.text: Also, be careful not to run into the bag! It might hurt.
Items.name: Gym Teacher
